description:
A mysterious girl who `fell from the sky`, Hikari fell in love with Takeru at first sight after being found in the first episode. She is very cheerful and thinks that almost everything is beautiful. While she can not remember anything before the day Takeru found her. Hikari has split personalities, and her appearance changes depending on which one is dominant; her "good" personality is characterised by red hair and green eyes, and her "evil" personality is characterised by pink hair and red eyes.
It is later discovered her purpose is to destroy Earth. By the series` end, she decides to destroy the earth, but Takeru stops her with his love for her. In the end of the anime, Hikari instead lives with Akari in the stars, though claims to return someday.
name: Hikari
